components.DnDArea.dnd-area-head-1: Drag and drop files to be signed here
components.DnDArea.dnd-area-head-3: click here to choose files to be signed
components.DnDArea.dnd-area-head-sm: Tap here to choose files to be signed
components.DocManager.invited-multisign-: Documents you are invited to sign
components.DocManager.invited-unauthn-ti: You have been invited to sign the following document(s)
components.DocManager.owned-multisign-le: Documents you have invited others to sign
components.DocManager.unauthn-text: You are currently not invited to sign any documents. The organization/identity provider you are affiliated with does not have permission to upload your own documents into eduSign to sign. Please contact your IT-department if you would like to be able to sign your own documents or invite others to sign your documents.
components.ForcedPreview.confirm-doc-too: Click here to approve the document for signing
components.ForcedPreview.disabled-confir: Once you have scrolled to the end of the document you will be able to approve the document for signing
components.ForcedPreview.dissaprove-doc-: Click here to reject/remove the document
components.ForcedXMLPreview.confirm-doc-: Click here to approve the document for signing
components.ForcedXMLPreview.dissaprove-d: Click here to reject/remove the document
components.Header.header-unauthz-for-sit: You don't seem to be authorized to use this site at this moment
components.InviteEditForm.edit-invitatio: Add an (optional) message to send to all new invitees
components.InviteForm.email-problem-dup: That email has already been invited
components.InviteForm.invitation-text-fi: Add a message to send to all invitees
components.InviteForm.loa-select-help: How sure you can be on the identity of the person signing. Note that the Level of Assurance an identity can provide depends on the Identity provider. Read more about this on eduSign wiki.
components.InviteForm.newname-text-field: New name for document to send for signatures:
components.InviteForm.ordered-choice-hel: Invited persons will be asked to sign document in a given order.
components.InviteForm.send-invitation-to: Send invitations to sign to indicated people
components.InviteesWidget.add-invitation: Invite one more person to sign this document
components.Main.contact-local-it-msg: If you experience problems with eduSign contact your local IT-support
components.ReInviteForm.re-invitation-te: Add a message to send to all invitees pending to sign
components.ReInviteForm.re-invite-people: Send reminders to people pending to sign {docName}
components.ReInviteForm.resend-invitatio: Resend invitations to sign to invitees pending to sign
components.validation.email-problem-dup: That email has already been invited
components.validation.save-doc-problem-d: A document with that name has already been loaded
components.validation.too-many-invitatio: It is only possible to invite at most {max_signatures} people
components.widgets.button-download-parti: Download partially signed document. Be sure to save the original rather than a copy.
components.widgets.button-download-tooti: Download signed document. Be sure to save the original rather than a copy.
components.widgets.button-sign-tootip: Select documents above and click here to send them for signing. You will be redirected to login again to authenticate yourself when signing.
components.widgets.clear-docs-tootip: Discard all documents in the "Personal documents" list above
components.widgets.forced-preview-button: You need to approve all documents before they can be signed
components.widgets.invited-decline-butto: Click here to decline your invitation to sign this document.
components.widgets.invited-delegate-butt: Click here to delegate the signature of this document to someone else.
components.widgets.multisign-button-toot: Click here to invite others to sign
components.widgets.owned-skip-button-hel: All requested users have answered your invitation to sign the document, click here to skip adding your final signature
components.widgets.retry-button-tootip: Try again to prepare the document for signing
components.widgets.sendsigned-choice-hel: Send final signed document via email to all who signed it.
components.widgets.skipfinal-choice-help: Finalize the signature flow automatically after the last person invited responds to the invitation.
containers.DnDArea.rejected-doc: Not a PDF or XML document: {name}
declining-document-signature: You have declined to sign this document.
docmanager-help-declined-invited: You have declined to sign this document. It will dissapear from here if you reload the app.
docmanager-help-failed-loa-invited: Your account does not provide the required security level. Please take the steps to provide it.
docmanager-help-failed-loading: This does not seem to be a valid document
docmanager-help-failed-preparing: There was a problem preparing the document for signing, clik on the button labelled "retry" to try again
docmanager-help-failed-signing: There was a problem signing the document, to try again click on the checkbox to the left and then on the button labelled "Sign selected documents"
docmanager-help-incomplete: You must wait for all invited people to respond before signing this document yourself.
docmanager-help-loaded: To sign this document, select it on the checkbox to left and then click on the button labelled "Sign selected documents"
docmanager-help-loading: Please wait while the document loads
docmanager-help-selected: Click on the button below labelled "Sign selected documents" to sign this document
docmanager-help-signed: Document succesfully signed, click on the button labelled "Download (signed)" to download it
docmanager-help-signed-invited: You have successfully signed the document. Note that if you reload the app you will not have access to the document anymore. The inviter has been notified of your signature, it is up to them to decide if the system should send you the final signed version.
docmanager-help-signing: Please wait while the document is signed
docmanager-help-template-loaded: To create a copy of this template, click on "invite others to sign"
docmanager-help-unconfirmed: Click on the button labeled "Preview and approve" to review the document and confirm that you approve it for signature
docmanager-help-unconfirmed-title: This document has not yet been approved
header-confirm-clear-text: Clicking "Confirm" will remove all documents from your list
header-confirm-remove-owned-text: Clicking "Confirm" will remove all invitations to sign the document
load-doc-problem-preparing: There was a problem preparing the document
prepare-big-doc-problem: Problem preparing document, it is too big
prepare-doc-problem: There was a problem signing the document
problem-clearing-db: problem clearing db, please try again
problem-editing-invitation: Problem editing invitation to sign, please try again
problem-fetching-document: Problem fetching document from the backend, please try again
problem-getting-signed: Problem getting signed documents, please try again later
problem-opening-edit-form: Problem opening edit form, please try again later
problem-removing-multisign: Problem removing multi sign request, please try again
problem-restoring-document: Problem restoring document, please load it again
problem-sending-invitations: Problem sending invitations to sign, please try again
problem-signing-doc: There was a problem signing the document
problem-skipping-signature: Problem skipping final signature, please try again
problem-updating-pdf-form: Problem filling in PDF form, please try again
save-doc-problem-db: Problem adding document, please try again
save-doc-problem-dup: A document with that name has already been loaded
save-docs-problem-db: Problem adding documents, please try again
save-docs-problem-preparing: Problem preparing document for signing. Please try again or contact the site administration.
save-docs-problem-session: Problem saving document(s) in session. Please try again or contact the site administration.
validate-problem-password: Please do not supply a password protected document
